name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.AddArtifactsExpireIn
description: Set `artifacts:expire_in` in `.gitlab-ci.yml` to prevent storage bloat from indefinitely stored artifacts.
options: [{"name":"expireIn","type":"String","displayName":"Expire in","description":"Duration after which artifacts expire.","example":"1 week","required":true},{"name":"jobName","type":"String","displayName":"Job name","description":"The job to apply this to. If not provided, applies to the `default` section.","example":"build_job"},{"name":"acceptTheirs","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Accept theirs","description":"When the setting already exists, prefer the original value."}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.AddCache
description: Add `cache` configuration to `.gitlab-ci.yml` for faster builds.
options: [{"name":"key","type":"String","displayName":"Cache key","description":"The cache key expression.","example":"$CI_COMMIT_REF_SLUG","required":true},{"name":"paths","type":"List","displayName":"Paths","description":"Paths to cache.","example":".cache/,vendor/","required":true},{"name":"policy","type":"String","displayName":"Policy","description":"The cache policy.","example":"pull-push"},{"name":"jobName","type":"String","displayName":"Job name","description":"The job to add cache to. If not provided, applies to the `default` section.","example":"build_job"},{"name":"acceptTheirs","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Accept theirs","description":"When the setting already exists, prefer the original value."}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.AddComponent
description: Add a GitLab component to an existing list, or add a new list where none was present.
options: [{"name":"newComponent","type":"String","displayName":"Component","description":"Name of the component to use add.","example":"$CI_SERVER_FQDN/components/opentofu/full-pipeline","required":true},{"name":"version","type":"String","displayName":"Version","description":"Version of the component to add.","example":"0.10.0","required":true},{"name":"inputs","type":"List","displayName":"Inputs","description":"The set of inputs to provide","example":"opentofu_version: 1.6.1"},{"name":"insertMode","type":"InsertMode","displayName":"Insert mode","description":"Choose an insertion point when multiple mappings exist. Default is `Last`.","valid":["Before","After","Last"]}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.AddDefaultKeyword
description: Add or update a keyword in the `default` section of `.gitlab-ci.yml`.
options: [{"name":"keyword","type":"String","displayName":"Keyword","description":"The keyword to add under the `default` section.","example":"image","required":true},{"name":"value","type":"String","displayName":"Value","description":"The value for the keyword.","example":"ruby:3.0","required":true},{"name":"acceptTheirs","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Accept theirs","description":"When the keyword already exists, prefer the original value."}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.AddInterruptible
description: Set `interruptible: true` in `.gitlab-ci.yml` to allow pipelines to be cancelled when superseded.
options: [{"name":"jobName","type":"String","displayName":"Job name","description":"The job to make interruptible. If not provided, applies to the `default` section.","example":"build_job"},{"name":"acceptTheirs","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Accept theirs","description":"When the setting already exists, prefer the original value."}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.AddRetry
description: Add `retry` configuration to `.gitlab-ci.yml` for resilience against infrastructure failures.
options: [{"name":"max","type":"int","displayName":"Max retries","description":"Maximum number of retries (0-2).","example":"2","required":true,"value":0},{"name":"when","type":"List","displayName":"When","description":"List of failure types to retry on.","example":"runner_system_failure,stuck_or_timeout_failure"},{"name":"jobName","type":"String","displayName":"Job name","description":"The job to add retry to. If not provided, applies to the `default` section.","example":"build_job"},{"name":"acceptTheirs","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Accept theirs","description":"When the setting already exists, prefer the original value."}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.AddStages
description: Add or Update the set of stages defined in `.gitlab-ci.yml`.
options: [{"name":"stages","type":"List","displayName":"Stages","description":"Stages to add.","example":"build,test,deploy","required":true},{"name":"acceptTheirs","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Accept theirs","description":"When the set of stages would conflict, prefer the original value."},{"name":"insertMode","type":"InsertMode","displayName":"Insert mode","description":"Choose an insertion point when multiple mappings exist. Default is `Last`.","valid":["Before","After","Last"]}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.AddTemplate
description: Add a GitLab template to an existing list, or add a new list where none was present.
options: [{"name":"newTemplate","type":"String","displayName":"Template","description":"Name of the template to use instead.","example":"OpenTofu/Base.gitlab-ci.yml","required":true},{"name":"insertMode","type":"InsertMode","displayName":"Insert mode","description":"Choose an insertion point when multiple mappings exist. Default is `Last`.","valid":["Before","After","Last"]}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.AddTimeout
description: Set `timeout` in `.gitlab-ci.yml` to prevent jobs from hanging indefinitely.
options: [{"name":"timeout","type":"String","displayName":"Timeout","description":"The timeout duration.","example":"1 hour","required":true},{"name":"jobName","type":"String","displayName":"Job name","description":"The job to set timeout on. If not provided, applies to the `default` section.","example":"build_job"},{"name":"acceptTheirs","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Accept theirs","description":"When the setting already exists, prefer the original value."}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.AddWorkflowRules
description: Add `workflow:rules` to `.gitlab-ci.yml` to control pipeline creation.
options: [{"name":"rules","type":"String","displayName":"Rules","description":"The YAML snippet defining the workflow rules.","example":"- if: $CI_PIPELINE_SOURCE == 'merge_request_event'\\n- if: $CI_COMMIT_BRANCH && $CI_OPEN_MERGE_REQUESTS\\n  when: never\\n- if: $CI_COMMIT_BRANCH","required":true},{"name":"acceptTheirs","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Accept theirs","description":"When workflow rules already exist, prefer the original value."}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.ChangeComponent
description: Change a GitLab Component in use.
options: [{"name":"oldComponent","type":"String","displayName":"Old Component","description":"The name of the component to match.","example":"$CI_SERVER_FQDN/components/opentofu/full-pipeline","required":true},{"name":"oldComponentVersion","type":"String","displayName":"Old Component version","description":"Version of the existing component to use match.","example":"0.10.0","required":true},{"name":"newComponent","type":"String","displayName":"New Component","description":"Name of the new component to use instead.","example":"$CI_SERVER_FQDN/components/opentofu/full-pipeline"},{"name":"newComponentVersion","type":"String","displayName":"New Component version","description":"Version of the new component to use instead.","example":"0.10.0","required":true}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.ChangeTemplate
description: Change a GitLab template in use.
options: [{"name":"oldTemplate","type":"String","displayName":"Template","description":"The name of the template to match.","example":"Terraform/Base.gitlab-ci.yml","required":true},{"name":"newTemplate","type":"String","displayName":"Template","description":"Name of the template to use instead.","example":"OpenTofu/Base.gitlab-ci.yml","required":true}]

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.MigrateToRules
description: Replace the deprecated `only` and `except` keywords with equivalent `rules` in `.gitlab-ci.yml` job definitions. When both `only` and `except` are present, they are combined into a single `rules` block. Handles simple ref list forms; complex object forms with `refs`, `variables`, or `changes` sub-keys are left unchanged.

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.RemoveTemplate
description: Remove a GitLab template from use.

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.BestPractices
description: Apply GitLab CI/CD best practices to `.gitlab-ci.yml`. This includes adding `workflow:rules` to prevent duplicate pipelines, setting `interruptible: true` and `retry` in the `default` section, configuring `artifacts:expire_in`, and setting a job `timeout`.

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.search.FindComponent
description: Find a GitLab Component in use.

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.search.FindDeprecatedExcept
description: Find usages of the deprecated `except` keyword in `.gitlab-ci.yml`. The `except` keyword is deprecated in favor of `rules`.

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.search.FindDeprecatedOnly
description: Find usages of the deprecated `only` keyword in `.gitlab-ci.yml`. The `only` keyword is deprecated in favor of `rules`.

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.search.FindTemplate
description: Find a GitLab Template in use.

name: org.openrewrite.gitlab.search.FindDeprecatedSyntax
description: Find usages of deprecated `only` and `except` keywords in `.gitlab-ci.yml`. These keywords are deprecated in favor of `rules`.
